channel.title: Meta on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Simba Tango

item.title: How to get that nice picture next to your comment
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Daniel Semper Some weeks ago, I got a question from another blog how I got the picture next to my comment on their site. It is really easy, all you have to do is to sign up for free at gravatar, upload your photo, and it will appear next to your comments on a wide range of sites, including most blogs powered by Wordpress (like this is). From the gravatar site:

item.title: Anniversary
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by smcgee One year of simbatango.com Yay! I checked the stats for what would be the most popular regular posts, and they appear to be: Rose in mouth Alejandro Hermida & Maria Jose Grattarola Tango film club On circulation Entering the milonga At feedburner, keeping track of my subscribers (thanks to all of you for reading!) the top five are: Competition
